DOC.brief_summary: The focus study assess safety GSK 's H1N1 vaccine real life condition soon vaccine use , mass vaccination programme , system rapid generation , communication evaluation safety data . This study commitment European Medicines Agency ( EMEA ) , part GlaxoSmithKline Biologicals ' ( GSK Biologicals ' ) risk management plan pandemic influenza vaccination .
DOC.brief_title: Post-Authorization Safety Study GSK Biologicals ' Pandemic Influenza Vaccine ( H1N1 ) United Kingdom
DOC.detailed_description: Collaborator : Medicines Healthcare product Regulatory Agency
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent , assent appropriate , obtain subject/from subject 's parent ( ) / Legally Acceptable Representative ( ) ( LAR ) . A male female subject vaccinate first dose GSK Biologicals ' H1N1 pandemic influenza vaccine shortly ( < 24h ) recruit study , within GP practice participate study subject register .
